TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClipboardData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the data passed around with the clipboard.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData> contains three types of data:
- The data itself, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Data%2A> property.
- The metadata, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Metadata%2A> property.
- The version information, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Version%2A> property.
